item.title: Javascript Canvas Bouncing Balls
item.author: prtamil@gmail.com (Tamilselvan.Rangasami)
item.description: Javascript Canvas tutorial This is my first javascript canvas demo. We will discuss about how to building it. no canvas Toggle Demo Lets start with Simple Vector Class function Vector(x,y){ this.x = x || 0; this.y = y || 0; } //Add another vector Vector.prototype.add = function(vector) { this.x += vector.x; this.y += vector.y; } //multiply with scalar Vector.prototype.multiplyScalar = function(scalar){ this.x *= scalar; this.
